name: BlindJump
description:
An adventure game for Gameboy Advance. Procedurally generated levels, collectible items, and periodic boss fights. Supports multiplayer with a link cable.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move. Hold the A button to shoot, which will also cause you to strafe while walking. Use the B button to interact/select stuff. You can swap the A/B buttons in the settings, if you don't like the defaults. Hold the left bumper to open a minimap, after unlocking the map system item. Hold the right bumper for quick access to certain single-use items. Press select to open your full inventory. Press start to open up a menu with more options.
